alert.note: Alert for Las Animas (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 30 at 2:28PM MDT until June 30 at 3:15PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Las Animas County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 315 PM MDT. * At 228 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hoehne, or 12 miles east of Trinidad, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Las Animas County. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
